1.content:
after landing, they make a camp in near of the sea, to make a plan,
"oke, we split up to gather our supply for ship" say yuna
"whatttt split up you say?" said penelo "are you crazy? the monster in here is strong enough to beat us with single blow, if together, how if we split up?
"hem.. perhaps it right but we don't have another choice,"
"yes i am agree we just gather some supplay then back here, just it"said alicia
"uh.. okay, but how if we get captured or..."
"if we meet one of them just run as fast as you can" said lenneth
two of cat like monster look every girl with pervert face, "hello girl.." said on of them
"damn.. we have been caught"
before they draw their weapon to attack the two monster use them skill to attack and make all girl unconsious for instant.
"wow.. they all pretty from who we start our punishment?" said the cat
the coice..
1.title: the way you punished

info.brief_description: all girl in game adventure in all over the world with danger lurking their beauty
info.description: the adventure begin, the girl from all over game begin their jurney, but they landed in pervert islan full with creature ready to enjoy them
